item.title: Object Timer
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

maby this helps it’s called action interval dunno where to add it so i give u my whole code (thieve btw)

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); }

item.title: Object Timer
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

Yeah, I know I’m a moron, blah, blah, blah.

I need to make it so you have to wait 2, 3 seconds before you get the experience from the object. I use devolution v7. Not that it should matter. It has actiontimer and a few other I cant remember.

if (objectID == 380) { addSkillXP(50, 6); }

In that code above it add’s 50 experience to the magic skill. Now I would like to add a small timer so no one spam skills. Simple enough, reply soon guys :).

Read full topic
